title: How to Make Chili's Molten Chocolate Cake at Home

steps.headline: Make the cake batter following the directions on the box.
Pour 1/2 cup of batter into greased cups in the muffin pan.
Bake for 30-40 minutes, until a fork inserted into the center of a cake comes out clean.
Flip the cakes out of the pan and allow to cool.
Slice the top off of the cakes so that the cakes lay flat when turned upside down (this is how they will be served).
Once flipped, use a sharp knife to cut a 1 ⁄2 inch (3.8 cm) chunk in the center of the bottom (now the top) of the cake.
Scoop out the chunk you just cut, and discard.
Spoon two tablespoons of the hot fudge topping into each hole, then put each cake into a sealed container and freeze.
When you are ready to serve it, drizzle a serving plate with caramel and place a cake on the plate.
Put the plate with the cake in the microwave for 40-45 seconds, until the fudge starts to bubble.
Let the cake rest for half a minute, then scoop out one scoop of vanilla ice cream and place on top of the cake.
Pour some Magic Shell chocolate topping on the ice cream and serve.
Enjoy your Chili's Molten Chocolate Cake!
